```{r setup, echo = F}
knit_hooks$set(wrap = function(before, options, envir){
  if (before){
    paste0('<', options$wrap, '>')
  } else {
    paste0('</', options$wrap, '>')
  }
})

knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, dpi = 180, fig.height = 5, fig.width = 7, fig.align = "center")
options(width=140, dplyr.width = 150)
```
